name: Kintaro [Vacation]
skill: Deals 1691/2071 DMG to surrounding enemies; decreases targets' speed by 25%/30% for a limited time.
ability: Moderately increases DMG dealt when one of the Four Heavenly Kings of Raiko is on the team.

additional_data.description: One of the Four Heavenly Kings of Raiko who rid the capital of the evil that lurked within. He joined Amanogawa's contest at the request of his friend Urashima Taro, and now he's devoted his mind, body, and soul to fulfilling his wish to become good-looking. Urashima Taro may or may not also be the one responsible for Kintaro's stoic yet provocative new appearance.
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ Limited Jewel Summon 28/06/17 to 05/07/17
◦ Trade at Exchange for 50 Mochi 28/06/17 - 05/07/17
additional_data.notes_and_trivia:
◦ Summon rate increased until 05/07/17
◦ Can only be exchanged once

summon: "It's gonna come true, just you wait."
limit_break: "Now, at last, I'll be a total studmuffin!"
